protocols Coordinate with GSOC for real-time threat monitoring during events and ensure seamless integration between event operations and broader security infrastructure Identify and coordinate to skills with ability to manage multiple concurrent events while maintaining focus on long-term program development Understanding of event security technology systems, emergency response procedures, and industry best practices for protecting high-profile gatherings Comfortable working flexible hours to support international events across multiple time zones Based in or willing to relocate to San
